A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Left more questions than answers for me than Force Awakens.  It didn't really do it for me\, seem like they just trying to mop away all the old characters and force the new ones on us.  A lot of lore breaking items in the movie\, the movie don't seem to follow this timeline whatsoever. A lot of strong female characters\, I think it's imbalance\, and not enough strong male characters in the movie.  Everyone seem to be from the United Kingdom in Star Wars. Didn't really answer much about Snoke character\, he died to easily.  Interesting how Luke Skywalker went to hell and back to save his father but so easily willing to kill his nephew over a thought.
